channel.title: projects on Alex Zhu
channel.description: Recent content in projects on Alex Zhu

item.title: Tutorial: How I Made This Website and You Can Too
item.description: I wanted a simple blog website that was easy to set up and use, and also one where I had ownership and customization: the answer was a Hugo generated static site hosted on GitHub Pages.

item.title: SE 101 Final Project: Full Stack Arduino Exercise Tracker (4Gains)
item.description: Our final project for SE101 was supposed to be a exercise tracker device that would revolutionize the fitness experience.
